a70f2f71-6edd-40e0-8d90-9ac8c842dd14.name: Loomio
a70f2f71-6edd-40e0-8d90-9ac8c842dd14.description: Loomio is a collaborative decision-making tool that makes it easy for anyone to participate in decisions which affect them

04fda661-e904-4857-8f8a-0e9d8dde527d.name: BitNation
04fda661-e904-4857-8f8a-0e9d8dde527d.description: Collaborative platform for voluntary self-governance powered by bitcoin 2.0 blockchain technology. Deployed applications include blockchain based passport, land deed, and marriage systems.

5d1bacde-5d3f-40a3-ad56-1693474be8aa.name: PlaceSpeak
5d1bacde-5d3f-40a3-ad56-1693474be8aa.description: PlaceSpeak is a location-based consultation utility. Share your insights on local issues directly with city officials and other decision makers to help solve communal challenges and launch new initiatives. Weâ€™re passionate about citizen-powered change and already have thousands of civically minded individuals engaging with hundreds of organisations.

2b2d4a2e-b4b1-4762-a772-289dc7184990.name: CKAN Open Data Portal
2b2d4a2e-b4b1-4762-a772-289dc7184990.description: Open source data portal software used by numerous governments, organisations, and communities around the world.

8b809e4b-014a-440e-9ca0-0ccb58cfff69.name: DemocracyOS
8b809e4b-014a-440e-9ca0-0ccb58cfff69.description: DemocracyOS is an online space for deliberation and voting on political proposals. It is a platform for a more open and participatory government.The software aims to stimulate better arguments and come to better rulings, as peers.

a243a0f0-4f1f-48e5-a8d4-9a418514abbc.name: Github
a243a0f0-4f1f-48e5-a8d4-9a418514abbc.description: Powerful collaboration, code review, code management, open source and private project management.

d7403cce-cb4f-48ff-a7c7-1491efd45c8f.name: Holacracy
d7403cce-cb4f-48ff-a7c7-1491efd45c8f.description: Holacracy is a social technology or system of organizational governance in which authority and decision-making are distributed throughout a holarchy of self-organizing teams rather than being vested in a management hierarchy. Holacracy is a new way of running an organization that removes power from a management hierarchy and distributes it across clear roles, which can then be executed autonomously, without a micromanaging boss. The work is actually more structured than in a conventional company, just differently so. With Holacracy, there is a clear set of rules and processes for how a team breaks up its work, and defines its roles with clear responsibilities and expectations.

a10d2694-16e2-47b7-96f5-1ce3c74bfd81.name: Long Distance Voter
a10d2694-16e2-47b7-96f5-1ce3c74bfd81.description:
Long Distance Voter will help you register to vote or get an absentee ballot online. We work aggressively to build and leverage technology to remove barriers to voting. Long Distance Voter launched in 2008 as an information-based site for absentee voters. 

The site now covers all aspects of voting, from registering to vote, to voting-by-mail, to voting early, to answering questions about what ID to bring to the polls. LongDistanceVoter.org is the most-visited site for accurate voting information.

With the gutting of the Voting Rights Act, attacks on early voting hours and Election Day registration, and the passage of restrictive voter ID laws, Long Distance Voter's services are more essential than ever. We're building a small team of technology experts to deliver best-in-class solutions to mounting democratic problems. We won't rest until every who wants to vote can easily cast a ballot.

09bd9542-a2e6-40d5-890e-b28b7cc06490.name: Loomio
09bd9542-a2e6-40d5-890e-b28b7cc06490.description: Loomio is a collaborative decision-making tool that makes it easy for anyone to participate in decisions which affect them.

01e0136c-8026-4fad-818e-0deb153a4df4.name: Neighbor.ly
01e0136c-8026-4fad-818e-0deb153a4df4.description:
Neighborly curates public works investment opportunities creating an easier and more personalized way to make public investments.
Be neighborly by investing in your community through public projects like parks, education, and other civic infrastructure.
